text: I got this coconut oil because my cousin told me about it and i love it!!! it's excellent to cook with or just to eat a teaspoon of it at a time, or to put in your hair for a treatment or to rub on your skin if it's too dry, this coconut oil helps sooooo much! It works great for me with my type2 diabetes and circulation problems i have in my legs! this stuff has really helped me get better!!!!!
